mapper.select: SELECT store_id id, store_name name, store_img img, store_score score, category_name category, location_name location FROM ( SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id FROM tbl_store ORDER BY store_name LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}) s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id ORDER BY store_name

SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, s.category_id, category_name, s.location_id, location_name FROM tbl_store s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id

SELECT COUNT(store_id) FROM tbl_store WHERE store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM tbl_location WHERE location_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM tbl_category WHERE category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

SELECT s.store_id id, store_name name, store_img img, store_score score, category_name category, location_name location, store_lat lat, store_lng lng FROM ( SELECT store_id, store_name, store_img, store_score, category_id, location_id FROM tbl_store WHERE store_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM tbl_location WHERE location_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM tbl_category WHERE category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY store_name LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}) s, tbl_category c, tbl_location l, tbl_store_detail d WHERE s.category_id = c.category_id AND s.location_id = l.location_id AND s.store_id = d.store_id ORDER BY store_name
